title: If Michelle Williams Wins a Grammy for โDeath Becomes Her,โ Destinyโs Child Will Match This Impressive BeatlesยRecord
summary: Here's how the beloved girl group could enter rarified air at February's ceremony.
body: Beyoncรฉ owned the 67th Annual Grammy Awards on Feb. 2 when she finally won her long-awaited album of the year trophy for Cowboy Carter . Queen Bey now boasts a whopping 35 Grammys, the most of anyone in Grammy history, but she isn’t the Destiny’s Child alumna who’s poised to make history at next year’s ceremony. Related Beyoncรฉโs โCowboy Carterโ AOTY Grammy Victory Feels Like a Lifetime Achievement Award โ But Donโt Just Dismiss It as One Destiny’s Child on Broadway: Beyoncรฉ, Kelly Rowland Support Michelle Williams at Opening Night of ‘Death Becomes Her’ Kendrick Lamar Leads 2026 Grammy Nominations Michelle Williams, who joined the Destiny’s Child lineup in 2000, is nominated alongside her Death Becomes Her castmates for best musical theater album at the 2026 Grammys. Should Williams triumph, Destiny’s Child will join The Beatles as the only groups in history where every member of its longest running/most commercially successful lineup won Grammys for work outside of the group. This stat excludes duos, supergroups (e.g., Cream, Boygenius), collectives (e.g., Parliament-Funkadelic, Snarky Puppy) and splinter groupโฆ

title: Ready for an Xtina Xmas? Christina Aguileraโs โMagicalโ Holiday Special Is Coming to TV ScreensยTonight
summary: The festive film set in Paris previously premiered in theaters.
body: Christina Aguilera lit up the Eiffel Tower while filming her holiday special, and now, she’s ready to light up your TV screens this Christmas. Related The 30 Best Christmas Songs of the 21st Century (So Far): Staff Picks Mariah Carey Reveals She’s Performing at the 2026 Olympics Opening Ceremony: ‘Ci Vediamo a Milano!’ ‘A Present We Can All Enjoy’: Kelly Clarkson to Headline Netflix’s NFL Christmas Game Day Open The vocalist holiday special titled Christina Aguilera: Christmas in Paris will be on tonight, Dec. 22 following a theatrical premiere earlier in the month. The hour-long program filmed in Paris is premiering at 9 p.m. ET/PT on the CBS Television Network and Paramount+ . It celebrates the 25th anniversary of Aguilera’s My Kind of Christmas album, which reached No. 28 on the Billboard 200 in 2000. A description reads that the special features “magical live performances from the City of Love” — filmed with a live orchestra above the Musรฉe du Quai Branly with Paris’ most famous tower sparkling behind the singer — as well as a “look into Aguileraโs remarkable career.” Thereโฆ

title: The HUAWEI FreeClip 2 match surprisingly great sound quality with an open design
summary: The sound quality of the HUAWEI FreeClip 2 open earbuds surprised me.
body: Open earbuds have taken the audio world by storm in recent years. Many major brands are launching products that promise to let you listen to music anytime, anywhere, while also staying aware of your surroundings. HUAWEI is already onto the second generation of its open earbuds, the FreeClip, and this new version feels more refined than any other open earbuds Iโve tried. While some issues with open earbuds are unavoidable (such as the lack of noise canceling), HUAWEI has taken major strides when it comes to comfort, sound quality, and features. Does that make the FreeClip 2 earbuds worth the high asking price? Well, that depends on a few things, starting with your sense of fashion.
